name: missouri

a state in the central US, whose capital city is Jefferson City: He did well among rural voters in Missouri. The family took a trip to Missouri.
More examplesFewer examplesHe plans to travel to Missouri and Florida.The county is located in the bootheel of the US state of Missouri, with its eastern border formed by the Mississippi River.
